title: Silver Jeans Co. Men's Craig Classic Fit Bootcut Jeans
description: CLASSIC DENIM COMFORT. Our Craig Classic Fit Bootcut Jeans are a must-have every day jean. This style features 5-pocket styling with a zip fly and button closure. Perfect for however you wear your jeans, Craig comes in multiple washes.

GO WITH THE FLOW. With a CLASSIC FIT that's relaxed, but not too loose and won't hinder movement, these jeans are a pair you can live comfortably in, but still look stylish. Rise: Sits at the waist with a classic hip and thigh; Inseam: Leg Opening: 19.5''

ENGINEERED FOR COMFORT. Easy and comfortable, Craig is a laid-back, classic fit for guys who value comfort most. It sits at the waist and features a longer saddle for extra room. Finished with a tried-and-true 19.5" bootcut leg opening.
STYLE AND FUNCTION. These jeans for men feature classic back pockets. Plus they're made with premium denim and designed to ensure a great fit that's stylish and practical.
MADE FOR HOW YOU LIVE. They're perfect for work to weekend, and every adventure in between. These jeans effortlessly transition from day to night without skipping a beat.

Silver Jeans Co. is more than denim, it's a legacy of adventure. For 100 years, we've been crafting jeans that fit flawlessly, feel comfortable, and look great, empowering you to make every moment a story worth telling. Our denim is a canvas for your stories, accompanying you on any adventure and celebrating your unique journey. When you start in Silvers, every day is an opportunity to express yourself fearlessly.
